sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.OrchestrationRunbookAutomationRuntime</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Orchestration Runtime script Include to reencrypt the paramater for automation for MID Server</description>
        <name>OrchestrationRunbookAutomationRuntime</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var OrchestrationRunbookAutomationRuntime = Class.create();
OrchestrationRunbookAutomationRuntime.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

	decrypt : function(encryptedParameter){
		if (encryptedParameter != null)
            encryptedParameter = encryptedParameter.toString();
        var kmfdecrypter = new sn_kmf_ns.KMFCryptoOperation("global.com_snc_runbook_automation_runtime_glideencrypter", "SYMMETRIC_UNWRAPPING").withAlgorithm("AES").withInputFormat("KMF_GLIDE_ENCRYPTER_FORMATTED").withOutputFormat("KMFNone");
        return kmfdecrypter.doOperation(encryptedParameter);
	},

	encryptParameterForAutomation : function(value){
		return new GlideAutomationEncrypter().encrypt(value);
	},

    type: 'OrchestrationRunbookAutomationRuntime'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-10-12 07:46:47</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>053dbbce0b713110381e40976877b208</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>OrchestrationRunbookAutomationRuntime</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Orchestration - Runtime" source="com.snc.runbook_automation.runtime">e58f185047320210cd4e1ce4316d4395</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_053dbbce0b713110381e40976877b208</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-10-12 07:46:47</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
